text:
Hi Steve,

You have to join beta (New workflow action for association ) in product updates in HubSpot 

Then you can try with workflow of remove association
<@U079YBL2ELC> Thank you so much for the information. I'll reach out to support when they come back to see if I can get enrolled.

Welcome :upside_down_face: 

If you have marketing hub subscription you can enrolled, in settings>product updates> search for assoication and clink on join beta> then go to workflow and you can easily use assocition.
Wow. Thank you so much! I didn't even know this section existed.
